title: Could the government's first-home buyer scheme be pushing up prices? | ABC NEWS
description: Research from Cotality has found the government-subsidised home deposit scheme could be pushing prices up. Housing analyst Eliza Owen says the policy is indicative of a government that's leaning in to rising home values rather than trying to bring prices lower. title: The key areas to watch as extreme heat blankets SA, Victoria and NSW | ABC NEWS
description: ABC meteorologist Tom Saunders reports that temperatures in southeast Australia are 17 degrees above the January average, marking the hottest day in 6 to 7 years for parts of South Australia, Victoria and NSW. Although there have been some scattered showers, the rain evaporates before hitting the ground. More extreme heat and elevated fire danger are expected. title: How will we remeber this Ashes series?
description: Pre-summer Brendon McCullum suggest it would be the "series of our lives". With the Ashes wrapped, what's the epitaph for this edition? Starc shone, Carey excelled and Head humbled the English attack as Bazball was buried. There were minimal contributions from Cummins, Hazelwood and Lyon, while Jacob Bethell announced his arrival. We pull apart the big series lessons and cast forward to the Test campaigns ahead. Featured: Ben Cameron, cricket commentator, ABC Sport.    Subscribe to the ABC Sport Newsletter (https://www.abc.net.au/connect)

title: NT rangers capture croc a day in first week of new year, more than 240 caught in 2025 | ABC NEWS
description: You've heard of Spotify wrapped, but what about crocify wrapped, as Territory parks and wildlife look back on the last year of wrangling reptiles.  And while 2026 has just begun, rangers are having a very snappy new year. Tilda Colling has this story for ABC News Northern Territory. title: Minneapolis ICE agent fatally shoots woman during immigration crackdown | ABC NEWS
description: An immigration agent in the United States has shot and killed a driver in the city of Minneapolis. The Trump Administration says the woman was trying to run over the officer. title: Albanese announces royal commission into Bondi terror attack | ABC NEWS
description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a national royal commission into the Bondi terror attack after weeks of pressure. Former High Court Justice Virginia Bell will lead the royal commission, which is expected to deliver findings by the end of the year.  NSW Premier Chris Minns welcomed the announcement, having called for a royal commission shortly after the attack, eliminating the need for a state-based inquiry. title: Warnings of extreme fire danger in SA as heatwave sends temperatures soaring | ABC NEWS
description: South Australian authorities are bracing for another day of extreme fire danger on Friday 8th January with dry lightning and wind gusts of up to 90-kilometres-an-hour forecast. There will be total fire bans in 11 of the state's 15 districts.  The change will signal the end of a heatwave which again sent temperatures into the mid to high 40s across most of the state. title: Bitcoin boom? What to expect from crypto currencies in 2026 | The World | ABC News
description: 2025 was a wild ride for digital currencies: Bitcoin hit record highs before a late slide in November, as the Trump administration pledged to make the United States the crypto capital of the world.
